title: Handle Check-in with Mobile Key
description: A guest who has pre-checked in on their mobile app arrives at the hotel and wants to get their mobile key.

tasks.description: Retrieve the guest's reservation and confirm their pre-check-in status.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the guest is checked in and a room has been assigned.

tasks.description: Verify the guest's identity by checking their ID.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully verifies the guest's identity.

tasks.description: Activate and issue the mobile key to the guest's smartphone.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully pushes the encrypted mobile key to the guest's app.
